attributes.action: Call upon the people of the UK to join together following the EU Referendum
attributes.background: We call upon the people of the UK to join together following the largest democratic vote in this nation's history. In these uncertain yet exciting times our strength is in our compassion, openness, and respect for our neighbours - even though occasionally we may disagree. That is the British way.

rejection.details: This petition calls on the people of the UK, not the UK Government and Parliament, to take action.
